text: Alright, Honeywood Forest.
I need to find Grace before it gets dark, which will be around 19:30. After that time, the forest can become pretty dangerous.
Oh no, what's this?
It's one of Grace's ribbons!
So she has been here. {WAIT=0.5}But where is she now?
Grace!! {WAIT=0.5}Where are you?! {WAIT=0.5}Are you there?!
No, I shouldn't go back. I have to find Grace first.
There must be {COLOR=BLUE}something near {COLOR=BLACK}where I found the ribbon.
Ah, young Mozes. You may enter here.
Are you surprised that we know who you are?
Please go see our Mother Fairy near the Great Tree.
Young Mozes, please be welcome.
What is this place?
It's... {WAIT=0.5}it's... {WAIT=0.5}so... {WAIT=1}magical!
And friendly.
Young lovely Mozes, it's wonderful to finally have you in our midst.
Dear young Mozes, I'm so glad you've finally entered our peaceful domain. You need not fear any orcs here.

choices.text: *Ask how they all seem to know you.*
*Ask if she has any information about Grace's whereabouts.*

text: We all watch over the people of Honeywood and strive to protect you whenever we can. So, Mozes, we've known you since your birth.
Unfortunately, our power and protection have their limits.
As I mentioned, he is very powerful and dangerous. We don't know much about him, but we do know his power is growing.
You cannot confront Ardor! Even if you were to face him, he's far beyond your capabilities.
Ardor {COLOR=BLUE}appears almost invulnerable {COLOR=BLACK}to all forms of attack. We're still trying to uncover the source of his power.
You'll have to rely on us to deal with Ardor. In time, we will find a way to defeat him.
I cannot stress this enough: Please stay away from him!

Ah, yes, little Grace... {WAIT=0.5}Terrible news, it appears that a wizard named Ardor has taken Grace captive. He is very powerful, and we Fairies aren't able to approach him yet. I am truly sorry for this, Mozes.
However, do not despair. There might still be a possibility for you. While your courage is admirable, bravery alone will not suffice. That's why we wish to aid you in your quest to find Grace.
Within the cave you came from, we've hidden a magic scroll that will be of great assistance against any orcs here in Honeywood Forest.

choices.text: *What did she say about a hidden magic scroll?*
*Ask for details about using a magic scroll.*
*Mention that hidden things are often difficult to find.*

text: I'm sorry, I don't know much about her captivity. I feel terrible. Perhaps she was in the wrong place at the wrong time. I sincerely hope so.
Don't worry, using this kind of scroll isn't too difficult.
You'll see, just 'use' the scroll when interacting with an orc.
When you return inside the cave, head all the way south, then east, and search the north wall. There's a hidden door in the light.
Before you go, please talk to the other Fairies. They can offer you valuable assistance.
Farewell, our beloved Mozes. Grace is blessed to have a brother like you. May the Goddess Tree smile upon you and your quest.
And watch out for Ardor! He is not to be trifled with!
Dear young Mozes, you've returned.
Dear young Mozes, shall we pray to the Goddess Tree so that your life will be in Her save hands?

choices.text: *How would praying to a tree would make you safe?* [BLUE](Save game)
*Politely let her know that won't be necessary. Take your leave.*

text: Your prayer has been heard.
Wonderful dear Mozes, please lie down here on this bed of healing flowers so that your weary bones may find some rest.

choices.text: *Healing flowers? Is that a thing? This may be interesting.* [BLUE](Restore health)
*Kindly let her know that you'll pass this time. Take your leave.*

text: Your health has been fully restored. Please come back anytime you feel weary.
How long would you like to lie down?
Our endearing Mozes, do you know about these so-called warp crystals?
Warp crystals, like the one right here, are scattered throughout Adan. When touched, they allow instantaneous travel to other places.

To unlock a new travel location, you must first activate the portal. This form of travel is both powerful and dangerous, so only individuals approved by us Fairies can use them. And we've decided that you, Mozes, are permitted.
Let us assist you in this manner on your quest to find Grace.
Don't hesitate, Mozes, go ahead and touch it.
Young Mozes, would you like to learn a spell?
It seems that you're not very familiar with spell casting yet.
I will teach you my two spells at rank 1, free of charge.
Ready? Here we go!
You can view all the spells you've learned in your Inventory Screen, and the best part is that you can now use these spells in battle!
Feel free to come see me again if you'd like to learn more spells.
Young Mozes, would you like to receive skill training?
Young Mozes, can I help you with anything?

choices.text: [Letter, Gold 5, Gemstone 5] *Deliver the message from the village elder.*

text: Let's see... {WAIT=0.5}Ah yes, a letter from our lovely Grahan...
Well of course, glad to be of assistance. Here you go.
Good luck on your travels, Mozes!
Don't forget to take the elder's request.
Young Mozes, can I help you with anything?
What a dense fog all of a sudden.
How peculiar...
